content.raw: so far so good.  I ran it on vrc worlds 1~3 and did some manual teleoperation without running into issues.  Gui manipulation is slow, but that should not be a concern here.  [jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64/82/) reports factory test failure, but the test passes on my desktop.
content.html: so far so good. I ran it on vrc worlds 1~3 and did some manual teleoperation without running into issues. Gui manipulation is slow, but that should not be a concern here. jenkins reports factory test failure, but the test passes on my desktop.

content.raw: Tested spawning a pr2, and it appears that multiple LaserVisuals have been created for pr2's laser visualization. The laser's color also gets darker as you move the model around with the mouse, which implies that duplicate visuals are being created. This could to be related to the lag mentioned in the previous comment.

The laser's color also gets darker as you move the model around with the mouse, which implies that duplicate visuals are being created.
